name: BackBlast
description:
A prototype made for the IGMC2018.

You fly a fighting jet, but its gun is its drive.

Destroy a many enemys as you can to get points. If you are fast enough, you will get rewarded with a point multiplier.

The sky is the limit... literary. Don't fly to high, or you will freeze and lose the control over your jet. You also should not touch the ground... understandable with a jet...

This game runs on the GMS2 engine.

All assets in this game are self-made, exept for the explosion sounds, which are from the site: www.freesoundeffects.com
